SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.CO_CD, A.MATR_CD) AS RN , A.FILE_TRGT_KEY --파일대상KEY , A.CO_CD --회사코드 , R.CODE_NM AS CO_NM , A.MATR_CD --자재코드 , A.MATR_NM --자재명 , A.GOODS_DIV --제품/자재구분 , R1.CODE_NM AS GOODS_DIV_NM , A.MATR_CLNT_DIV --거래처분류 , R2.CODE_NM AS MATR_CLNT_DIV_NM , A.MATR_DIV --자재유형 , R3.CODE_NM AS MATR_DIV_NM , A.MATR_GRP --자재분류-자재그룹 , R4.CODE_NM AS MATR_GRP_NM , A.MATR_MAT --소재 , A.MATR_SIZE --크기(사이즈) , A.MATR_SPEC --규격 , A.MATR_MAKR_NM --제조사(MAKER) , A.MATR_MNO --형번(Model No) , A.MATR_WT --중량 , A.MATR_UNIT --단위 , R5.CODE_NM AS MATR_UNIT_NM , A.ORIGIN_NM --원산지 , A.MATR_DRW_NO --대표도면 , A.MATR_TEST_DIV --입고검사구분 , R6.CODE_NM AS MATR_TEST_DIV_NM , A.DLVR_RQM_DAY --리드타임(납품소요일자) , A.MATR_PURC_DIV --구매/외주구분 , R7.CODE_NM AS MATR_PURC_DIV_NM , A.MIN_ORDRG_QTY --최소발주량 , A.MATR_SAFT_QTY --안전재고 , A.MATR_STOCK_CD --재고관리여부 , A.DSGN_2D_MD --2D설계소요일 , A.AVRG_2D_MD --2D평균소요일 , A.DSGN_3D_MD --3D설계소요일 , A.AVRG_3D_MD --3D평균소요일 , A.PRDCTN_RQM_MD --생산소요일 , A.PRDCTN_AVRG_MD --생산평균소요일 , A.USE_YN --사용여부 , A.MATR_PART_NO --파트번호 , A.PCHS_CLNT_CD1 --구매업체1 , C1.CLNT_NM AS PCHS_CLNT_NM1 , A.PCHS_CLNT_PCT1 --구매업체1비율 , A.PCHS_CLNT_CD2 --구매업체2 , C2.CLNT_NM AS PCHS_CLNT_NM2 , A.PCHS_CLNT_PCT2 --구매업체2비율 , A.PCHS_CLNT_CD3 --구매업체3 , C3.CLNT_NM AS PCHS_CLNT_NM3 , A.PCHS_CLNT_PCT3 --구매업체3비율 , A.MATR_UPR --최종구매단가 , A.MATR_AVRG_UPR --평균구매단가 , A.MATR_RMK --비고 , TO_CHAR(A.MATR_LAST_TRST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MATR_LAST_TRST_DT --최종거래일자 , A.MATR_ATNT_CD --대체자재코드 , A.MATR_NO --자재번호 , A.DSGN_TRGT_YN --설계대상구분 , A.ETC_FIELD1 --여분필드(고정) , A.ETC_FIELD2 --여분필드(숫자) , A.ETC_FIELD3 --여분필드(가변) , A.CREAT_ID --생성자 , U1.NAME AS CREAT_NM , A.CREAT_PGM --생성프로그램ID , TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREAT_DTTM --생성일 , A.UDT_ID --변경자 , U2.NAME AS UDT_NM , A.UDT_PGM --최종수정프로그램ID , TO_CHAR(A.UDT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UDT_DTTM --변경일 , MATR_MNG_ID , U3.NAME AS MATR_MNG_ID_NM FROM TB_BM05M01 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R ON R.CODE_ID = A.CO_CD --회사 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R1 ON R1.CODE_ID = A.GOODS_DIV --제품/자재구분 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R2 ON R2.CODE_ID = A.MATR_CLNT_DIV --거래처분류 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R3 ON R3.CODE_ID = A.MATR_DIV --자재유형 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R4 ON R4.CODE_ID = A.MATR_GRP --자재분류-자재그룹 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R5 ON R5.CODE_ID = A.MATR_UNIT --단위 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R6 ON R6.CODE_ID = A.MATR_TEST_DIV --입고검사구분 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R7 ON R7.CODE_ID = A.MATR_PURC_DIV --구매/외주구분 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 AS C1 ON C1.CLNT_CD = A.PCHS_CLNT_CD1 --구매업체1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 AS C2 ON C2.CLNT_CD = A.PCHS_CLNT_CD2 --구매업체2 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 AS C3 ON C3.CLNT_CD = A.PCHS_CLNT_CD3 --구매업체3 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 AS U1 ON U1.ID = A.CREAT_ID --생성자 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 AS U2 ON U2.ID = A.UDT_ID --변경자 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 AS U3 ON U3.ID = A.MATR_MNG_ID --관리자 WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CO_CD = 'GUN' AND NVL2(#{matrClntDiv},A.MATR_CLNT_DIV,'.') = NVL(#{matrClntDiv},'.')
AND REPLACE(REPLACE(A.SEARCH_DATA, '-', ''), ' ', '') LIKE '%'|| REPLACE(REPLACE(UPPER(#{searchValue}), '-', ''), ' ', '')||'%'
AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C1.CLNT_NM, A.MATR_NM, A.MATR_MAT, A.MATR_SPEC

SELECT MAX(A.FILE_TRGT_KEY) AS FILE_TRGT_KEY , MAX(A.MATR_CD) AS MATR_CD FROM TB_BM05M01 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CO_CD = 'GUN' AND REPLACE(UPPER(MATR_NM||MATR_MAT||MATR_SPEC||MATR_SIZE), ' ', '') = REPLACE(UPPER(#{matrNm}||#{matrMat}||#{matrSpec}||#{matrSize}) , ' ', '')
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BM05M01 SET MATR_NM = #{matrNm} --자재명 , GOODS_DIV = #{goodsDiv} --제품/자재구분 , MATR_CLNT_DIV = #{matrClntDiv} --거래처분류 , MATR_DIV = #{matrDiv} --자재유형 , MATR_GRP = #{matrGrp} --자재분류-자재그룹 , MATR_MAT = #{matrMat} --소재 , MATR_SIZE = #{matrSize} --크기(사이즈) , MATR_SPEC = #{matrSpec} --규격 , MATR_MAKR_NM = #{matrMakrNm} --제조사(MAKER) , MATR_MNO = #{matrMno} --형번(Model No) , MATR_WT = #{matrWt} --중량 , MATR_UNIT = #{matrUnit} --단위 , ORIGIN_NM = #{originNm} --원산지 , MATR_DRW_NO = #{matrDrwNo} --대표도면 , MATR_TEST_DIV = #{matrTestDiv} --입고검사구분 , DLVR_RQM_DAY = #{dlvrRqmDay} --리드타임(납품소요일자) , MATR_PURC_DIV = #{matrPurcDiv} --구매/외주구분 , MIN_ORDRG_QTY = #{minOrdrgQty} --최소발주량 , MATR_SAFT_QTY = #{matrSaftQty} --안전재고 , MATR_STOCK_CD = #{matrStockCd} --재고관리여부 , DSGN_2D_MD = #{dsgn2dMd} --2D설계소요일 , AVRG_2D_MD = #{avrg2dMd} --2D평균소요일 , DSGN_3D_MD = #{dsgn3dMd} --3D설계소요일 , AVRG_3D_MD = #{avrg3dMd} --3D평균소요일 , PRDCTN_RQM_MD = #{prdctnRqmMd} --생산소요일 , PRDCTN_AVRG_MD = #{prdctnAvrgMd} --생산평균소요일 , USE_YN = #{useYn} --사용여부 , PCHS_CLNT_CD1 = #{pchsClntCd1} --구매업체1 , PCHS_CLNT_PCT1 = #{pchsClntPct1} --구매업체1 발주비율 , PCHS_CLNT_CD2 = #{pchsClntCd2} --구매업체2 , PCHS_CLNT_PCT2 = #{pchsClntPct2} --구매업체2 발주비율 , PCHS_CLNT_CD3 = #{pchsClntCd3} --구매업체3 , PCHS_CLNT_PCT3 = #{pchsClntPct3} --구매업체3 발주비율 , MATR_RMK = #{matrRmk} --비고 , DSGN_TRGT_YN = #{dsgnTrgtYn} --설계대상구분 , ETC_FIELD1 = #{etcField1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ETC_FIELD2 = #{etcField2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ETC_FIELD3 = #{etcField3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , UDT_ID = #{userId} , UDT_PGM = #{pgmId} , UDT_DTTM = SYSDATE , MATR_UPR = #{matrUpr} --구매단가 , SEARCH_DATA = REPLACE(UPPER((SELECT CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 WHERE CLNT_CD=#{pchsClntCd1}) || #{matrCd} || #{matrNm} || #{matrMat} || #{matrSize} || #{matrSpec} || #{matrMakrNm} || #{matrMno}), ' ', '') , MATR_MNG_ID = #{matrMngId} --관리담당자ID WHERE FILE_TRGT_KEY = #{fileTrgtKey}
INSERT INTO TB_BM05M01_LOG SELECT A.* , 'D', #{userId}, sysdate FROM TB_BM05M01 A WHERE FILE_TRGT_KEY = #{fileTrgtKey}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_BM05M01 AS A WHERE REPLACE(REPLACE(MATR_SPEC, '-', ''), ' ', '') LIKE '%'|| REPLACE(REPLACE(#{matrMno}, '-', ''), ' ', '') ||'%' AND USE_YN = 'Y'
